data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we write to inform you that analysts or investors will visit Timken R&D Center Bengaluru as per details given below:
Day and Date - Wednesday 18 February 2026
Event - visit to Timken R&D Center Bengaluru
Type of Meeting - In person : Group of analysts /investors (Group Meet)

The above schedule is subject to change if any due to exigencies. 

Management may interact with analysts/investors during their visit to Timken R&D Center Bengaluru. No unpublished price sensitive information will be shared. 

Thanking you.

data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we hereby provide audio recording of Post Results Conference Call Q3 FY 2025-26 held on Monday 9 February 2026 which is available on the website of the Company at below link:

https://www.timken.com/en-in/investors/statutory-compliances/.

Kindly take this on record.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Board Meeting Date
data.news_body:
Timken India Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 04/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve Pursuant to Regulation 29 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform that a Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on Wednesday 4 February 2026 inter-alia to consider and approve Unaudited Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended 31 December 2025.

data.descriptor: Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.caption: Compliances-Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 74(5) of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Depositories and Participants) Regulations 2018 please find enclosed certificate received from our Registrar and Share Transfer Agent (CB Management Services Private Limited) confirming that the share certificates received for dematerialization have been mutilated and cancelled after due verification and the name of the respective depository has been substituted in the records as the registered owner within stipulated timelines for the quarter ended 31 December 2025.

Kindly request you to take this on record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Updates on Acquisition
data.news_body:
This is in furtherance to our earlier intimation dated 22 September 2025. 
We had informed that Timken India Limited (the Company) had entered into an Agreement to acquire 26.1% equity shares of Sunstreamgreen Energy C&I Three Private Limited (Target Company) to purchase power under Group Captive Scheme and this transaction would be completed on or before December 2025.
It may please be noted that above transaction is likely to be completed on or before March 2026.  
You are kindly requested to take note of above.

data.caption: ORDER PASSED BY INCOME TAX DEPARTMENT ASSESSMENT UNIT: UPDATE
data.news_body: This is in furtherance to our earlier intimation dated 19 December 2025 on this subject matter.  Pursuant to Regulation 30 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we hereby give update on Order passed by Income Tax Department Assessment Unit. For more details please see attachment.

data.caption: ORDER PASSED BY INCOME TAX DEPARTMENT ASSESSMENT UNIT
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we write to inform you about an order passed by Income Tax Department Assessment Unit. For more details please see attachment.

data.caption: APPEAL AGAINST ORDER PASSED BY DISTRICT CONSUMER DISPUTES REDRESSAL COMMISSION SHIMLA: UPDATE
data.news_body:
This is in furtherance to our earlier intimation dated 26 September 2024. The Company had filed appeal against order passed by District Consumer Disputes Redressal Commission Shimla in the matter of Mr. Ravi Shankar Sood v/s Timken India Limited and CB Management Services Private Limited. Parties have reached settlement and therefore appeal has been disposed off without any costs penalty to the Company.
For more details please see attachment.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we write to inform that Mr. Douglas Smith currently serving as Non-Executive Director has tendered his resignation as Director of the Company w.e.f. close of business hours on 15 December 2025 pursuant to upcoming retirement from the services of Timken. A copy of his resignation letter is enclosed herewith.
For more details please see attachment.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Updates on Acquisition
data.news_body:
In furtherance to our earlier communications dated 3 November 2025 & 22 November 2025 we wish to inform that purchase of equity shares of Timken GGB Technology Private Limited from Timken Europe B.V. and The Timken Company has been completed on 1 December 2025. 

You are kindly requested to take note of above.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Updates on Acquisition
data.news_body:
In furtherance to our earlier communication dated 3 November 2025 we wish to inform that Share Purchase Agreement for purchase of equity shares of Timken GGB Technology Private Limited from Timken Europe B.V. and The Timken Company has been executed on 21 November 2025 between the parties. 
You are kindly requested to take note of above.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body:
Change in Directors - Pursuant to Regulation 30 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we write to inform that on completion of tenure :

  Mr. Avishrant Keshava (DIN: 07292484) Whole-time Director will cease to be Director effective 30 September 2025. 
  Mr. Ajay Sood (DIN: 03517303) Independent Director will cease to be Director  effective 1 October 2025.

For more details please see Annexure - I.

Kindly request you to take this on record.

data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 74(5) of SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations 2018 please find enclosed certificate received from our Registrar and Share Transfer Agent (CB Management Services Private Limited) confirming that the share certificates received for dematerialization have been mutilated and cancelled after due verification and the name of the respective depository has been substituted in the records as the registered owner within stipulated timelines for the quarter ended 31 March 2025.

data.caption: Update On Bharuch Plant
data.news_body: In Continuation of all our earlier communications on this subject matter we are pleased to inform that formal inauguration of the Bharuch new plant was done today. It may please be noted that commencement of commercial production will be informed separately which is expected to start in present quarter i.e Q1 2025-26.

data.caption: Contact Details Of The Authorized Personnel For Disclosing Material Events/Information
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 (5) of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 read with Policy adopted by the Board of Directors of the Company for disclosure of material events/information we write to inform you that Chairman Managing Director Whole-time Director  Chief Finance Officer Company Secretary are severally authorized to determine whether the event / information is material and  they are also severally  authorized to disclose such event/information to the stock exchanges.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015  we hereby inform you that:
 Mr. Avishrant Keshava currently serving as Business Controller - India CFO & Whole-time Director has tendered his resignation as Business Controller - India & CFO of the Company w.e.f. close of business hours on 31 March 2025 on account of organizational changes. However he would continue to serve as a Whole-time Director of the Company. A copy of his resignation letter is enclosed herewith as Annexure - A.
 The Board of Directors at its meeting held today has appointed Mr. Sujit Kumar Pattanaik as Business Controller - India & Chief Financial Officer of the Company effective                   1 April 2025. Mr. Sujit Kumar Pattanaik is not debarred from being appointed as Chief Financial Officer. 
Please see attachment for more details.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: The trading window will be closed from 1 April 2025 till expiry of 48 hours of submission/publication of the Audited Financial Results of the Company for quarter and year ending 31 March 2025 to stock exchanges after obtaining approval of the Board of Directors.

data.caption: Update On New Manufacturing Facility At Bharuch
data.news_body: In furtherance to our earlier intimations dated 16 November 2022 and 15 November 2024 on this subject matter we hereby inform that commercial production from new manufacturing facility at Bharuch would commence in Q1 FY 2025-2026 i.e. April - June 2025.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting-Capacity Addition - Jamshedpur
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform that the Company is making investment as per details attached herewith.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 5 February 2025
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulations 30 and 33 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we write to inform you that the Board of Directors at its Meeting held on 5 February 2025 has considered and approved: 

1. Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended 31 December 2024 (Unaudited Financial Results). Unaudited Financial Results along with Limited Review Report issued by the Statutory Auditors of the Company.

2. Changes/amendments in Policies and revised Policies would be available at Companys website.

Please see attachment for more details.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Board Meeting Date
data.news_body: TIMKEN INDIA LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 05/02/2025 inter alia to consider and approve Pursuant to Regulation 29 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform that a Meeting of Board of Directors of the Company will be held on Wednesday 5 February 2025 inter-alia to consider and approve Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended 31 December 2024.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body:
It may please be noted that in terms of provisions of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 read with Code of Conduct to Regulate Monitor and Report trading by Insiders of the Company the trading window will be closed from 1 January 2025 till expiry of 48 hours of submission/publication of the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for quarter and nine months ending 31 December 2024 to stock exchanges after obtaining approval of the Board of Directors.  
The date of Board Meeting for aforesaid purpose will be intimated shortly.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On 27 May, 2022
data.news_body:
Dividend:

The Board has recommended dividend of Rs. 1.5/- per equity share of Rs 10 each fully paid up for the year ended 31 March, 2022. This dividend will be paid to eligible shareholders after obtaining approval of the members of the Company at ensuing Annual General Meeting.

The said Unaudited Financial Results have also been taken on record and approved by the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on 9 August, 2021.

Kindly request you to take this on record.

data.caption: Disclosures Of Related Party Transactions For The Half Year Ended 31 March, 2021
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we attach herewith a summary of related party transactions for the half year ended 31 March, 2021.

data.caption: Revised Outcome
data.news_body: In furtherance to our submission of Audited Financial Results for the quarter and year ended 31 March, 2021, we write to inform you that there was a typo error in the statement of financial results for the quarter & year ended 31 March, 2021. The value of Other Equity (Sl. No. 9) shall be read as '126,829' (Rs. in Lakhs) instead of 12,683 (Rs. in Lakhs) in the column of Financial Year ended 31 March, 2021. We attach herewith a revised copy of the first page of the said financial results.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulations 30 and 33 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we write to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today:
approved Audited Financial Results for the quarter and year ended 31 March, 2021. The Auditors of the Company M/s Deloitte Haskins & Sells LLP have issued Auditors Report with unmodified opinion on said Financial Results. Copy of Audited Financial Results for the quarter and year ended 31 March, 2021 along with Auditors Report is enclosed herewith. Declaration from Chief Financial Officer regarding unmodified opinion is attached herewith.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended 31 December, 2020
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we attach herewith Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended 31 December, 2020 along with Limited Review Report (without UDIN) issued by the Statutory Auditors of the Company for your record.
The Unaudited Financial Results have been reviewed by Audit Committee of the Board at its meeting held on 12 February, 2021.
The said Unaudited Financial Results have also been taken on record and approved by the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on 12 February, 2021.
Limited Review Report with UDIN is being filed separately.
Kindly request you to take this on record.
